ValidationRule.description: Enforces Opportunity Creation on Lead Conversion
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.Alias <> "autocln", CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "PGi"), IsConverted=true, ConvertedOpportunityId="", ISBLANK( Account__c), $User.Override_Validation_Rules__c = False, NOT($Setup.BypassRules__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: An Opportunity must be created on lead conversion for Leads without a Related Account. Please uncheck the Do not create a new opportunity upon conversion checkbox and press the Convert button again, or update the Related Account Field on the Lead.
